title: Red poll
brief_description: The Red Poll breed of cattle, which originated in East Anglia, England, is enjoying an increasing popularity throughout the world. It is a dual-purpose breed, providing milk and beef combined. The film explains to farmers the breed’s main characteristics and its advantages.
